title: What are the requirements to become a teacher of Dhaka University? - Quora

response.answer_text: Being a teacher, literally, requires a lot of patience and determination for teaching and research. However, testing such skill is quite unfeasible. Therefore, CGPA and a good record of thesis papers published in international journals are regarded a good mark. The higher the CGPA, the better it helps. Strongly recommended, a good presentation skill, however, will help you a lot in later career. Best of luck. Bon voyage!
You can join here after just only completing your Bachelor degree as a lecturer but for that you should have a very good CGPA.
